ExportCustoms.name: Vexage Coronet
ExportCustoms.description: Forewarn that fury awaits anyone who challenges your Kaithe and its rider.

ExportCustoms.name: Dauntair Coronet
ExportCustoms.description: A skilled rider repurposes the Void’s mark for their Kaithe.

ExportCustoms.name: Myrthen Coronet
ExportCustoms.description: Joy blossoms in the Myrthen Coronet.

ExportCustoms.name: Enverve Coronet
ExportCustoms.description: The Enverve Coronet elegantly expresses a bitter emotion.

ExportCustoms.name: Wistfall Coronet
ExportCustoms.description: The Wistfall Coronet depicts melancholy’s beauty.

ExportCustoms.name: Aetigo Kaithe
ExportCustoms.description: Aetigo Kaithes are a native species of Duviri’s southernmost island. Their emerald eyes once reflected the verdant plains they roamed, but when the island was reduced to ash, their eyes faded to nothing.

ExportCustoms.name: Psyacus Kaithe
ExportCustoms.description: Psyacus Kaithes inspire fear in the faint of heart. Common wisdom among Duviri citizens holds that those who mount the Psyacus Kaithe must be either courageous or heartless.

ExportCustoms.name: Histornam Kaithe
ExportCustoms.description: It is said that the great Dominus Thrax prefers Histornam Kaithes above all other breeds. It was on the back of a Histornam Kaithe that Thrax himself learned to ride.

ExportCustoms.name: Sviari Chamfron
ExportCustoms.description: The might of the Kaithe rider is expressed through the Sviari Chamfron’s sharp horns.

ExportCustoms.name: Dyrncaul Chamfron
ExportCustoms.description: The Dyrncaul Chamfron’s curved horns are reminiscent of the Tamm, a creature whose happiness is said to bring good fortune.

ExportCustoms.name: Irdeni Chamfron
ExportCustoms.description: The Irdeni Chamfron is reminiscent of the ever-changing hues in Duviri’s sky.

ExportCustoms.name: Kheyur Chamfron
ExportCustoms.description: The Kheyur Chamfron befits any formal occasion.

ExportCustoms.name: Dovin Saddle
ExportCustoms.description: The Dovin Saddle’s deep curve and lightweight structure make for strong balance and gentle communication with the Kaithe.

ExportCustoms.name: Vaidurian Saddle
ExportCustoms.description: The Vaidurian Saddle’s comfortable and sturdy design is ideal for those long hours riding Kaithes.

ExportCustoms.name: Sohseki Saddle
ExportCustoms.description: Style and comfort meet in the Sohseki Saddle. Its padding provides stability and protection during jumps.

ExportCustoms.name: Caersid Tail
ExportCustoms.description: The Caersid Tail bespeaks the spirit of the vengeful warrior.

ExportCustoms.name: Heoro Tail
ExportCustoms.description: A Kaithe with the Heoro Tail evokes glory.

ExportCustoms.name: Velific Tail
ExportCustoms.description: Adorn the movements of an elegant Kaithe with the Velific Tail.

ExportCustoms.name: Aebolg Tail
ExportCustoms.description: Bones laid bare in the Aebolg Tail are a reminder to appreciate the gift of life.

ExportCustoms.name: Histornam Tail
ExportCustoms.description: The Histornam Kaithe came into being with this regal tail.

ExportCustoms.name: Aetigo Tail
ExportCustoms.description: The Aetigo Kaithe came into being with this dignified tail.

ExportCustoms.name: Psyacus Tail
ExportCustoms.description: The Psyacus Kaithe came into being with this tapered tail.

ExportCustoms.name: Exorion Wings
ExportCustoms.description: Outstretched wings reveal the path to celestial planes.

ExportCustoms.name: Aethon Chamfron
ExportCustoms.description: Fan the flames of fortitude with the Aethon Chamfron.

ExportCustoms.name: Aethon Saddle
ExportCustoms.description: The Aethon Saddle's flames don't burn the skilled rider.

ExportCustoms.name: Aethon Tail
ExportCustoms.description: The Aethon Tail is a good companion piece to the rider of fleet-footed fire.
